title: Crackshot成品分享-持续更新
txt_content:
本帖最后由 9999999999999 于 2019-9-18 20:41 编辑 
缓慢飞行的炮:

动能炮:
    Item_Information:
        Item_Name: "&E[&6&LH&E] &F- &a动能炮 &f"
        Item_Type: 293
    Shooting:
        Right_Click_To_Shoot: true
        Cancel_Left_Click_Block_Damage: true
        Cancel_Right_Click_Interactions: true
        Projectile_Amount: 1
        Recoil_Amount: 6
        Projectile_Type: egg
        Projectile_Flames: true
        Projectile_Speed: 3
        Remove_Bullet_Drop: true
        Projectile_Damage: 30
        Bullet_Spread: 0.5
        Sounds_Shoot: ENTITY_BLAZE_DEATH-4-0-0
    Explosions:
        Enable: true
        Damage_Multiplier: 140
        Enable_Owner_Immunity: true
        Knockback: -1
        Explosion_Radius: 3
        Explosion_No_Grief: true
        On_Impact_With_Anything: true
    Firearm_Action:
        Type: bolt
        Open_Duration: 2
        Close_Duration: 1
        Reload_Open_Delay: 5
        Reload_Close_Delay: 3
        Close_Shoot_Delay: 3
        Close_Duration: 7
        Sound_Open: BLOCK_LAVA_EXTINGUISH-1-3-2,BLOCK_LAVA_EXTINGUISH-1-3-2
        Sound_Close: BLOCK_PISTON_EXTEND-1-2-0
    Ammo:
        Enable: false
        Ammo_Item_ID: 295
        Sounds_Out_Of_Ammo: BLOCK_NOTE_SNARE-1-2-0
        Sounds_Shoot_With_No_Ammo: BLOCK_NOTE_HARP-1-2-0
    Reload:
        Enable: true
        Reload_Amount: 1
        Reload_Duration: 70
        Take_Ammo_On_Reload: true
        Sounds_Out_Of_Ammo: CLICK-1-1-0
        Sounds_Reloading: BLOCK_WOODEN_DOOR_OPEN-1-2-8,BLOCK_PISTON_EXTEND-1-10-35,ENTITY_SKELETON_DEATH-1-0-40,ENTITY_PLAYER_HURT-1-0-66,BLOCK_WOODEN_DOOR_CLOSE-1-2-67
    Abilities:
        Reset_Hit_Cooldown: true
        No_Vertical_Recoil: true
        Super_Effective: PLAYER-0.5
    Extras:
        Disable_Underwater: true
    Particles:
        Enable: true
        Particle_Player_Shoot: smoke,FLAMES-1,explosion
        Particle_Impact_Anything: BLOCK_BREAK-165
    Custom_Death_Message: 
        Normal: "&c<shooter>&f > &E动能炮&f > &a<victim>" 


单发手枪:

        Sounds_Reloading: ENTITY_ARMORSTAND_BREAK-1-1-3,ITEM_BUCKET_FILL_LAVA-2-2-15,ENTITY_ARMORSTAND_BREAK-1-1-9,BLOCK_ANVIL_HIT-1-0-20

replies.txt_content: 请发布到插件衍生资源
